mapper.insert: insert into t_cfg_region (region_id, region_name, region_kind, up_region_id, region_code, area_code, industry, measure, remark, sort, region_level, state, path) values (#{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{measure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_cfg_region set region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_kind = #{regionKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up_region_id = #{upRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_code = #{regionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, measure = #{measure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_level = #{regionLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, state = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select region_id, region_name, region_kind, up_region_id, region_code, area_code, industry, measure, remark, sort, region_level, state, path from t_cfg_region where region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
